channel.description: Recent content in The 1975 on Music

item.title: The 1975 - All I Need To Hear
item.description:
Get out my records
When you go away
People are talking
I miss what they say
See it all means nothing my dear
If I can’t be holdin’ you near
So tell me you love me
‘Cause that’s all that I need to hear
I sit in my kitchen
With nothing to eat
With so many friends I
I don’t wanna meet
‘Cause I don’t need music in my ears
I don’t need the crowds and the cheers
Oh just tell me you love me
‘Cause that’s all that I need to hear
And I’ve been told so many times before
But hearin’ it from you means much more
So much more
Reply to my message
And pick up my calls
You see I wrote you a letter
It was no use at all
And oh I don’t care if you’re insincere
Just tell me what I wanna hear
You know where to find me
The place where we lived all these years oh
And tell me you love me
That’s all that I need to hear
Oh tell me you love me
That’s all that I need to hear

item.title: The 1975 - I'm In Love With You
item.description:
Heartbeat
Is coming in so strong
Oh if you don’t stop
I’m gonna need a second one
Oh there’s something I’ve been meaning to
Say to you baby(All night long)
Yeah there’s something I’ve been meaning to
Say to you baby
But I just can’t do it
In my car moving in
Feel like I can loosen my lips
(Coming on so strong)
I can summarize it for you(Ah)
It’s simple and it goes like this
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
She’s got a broad sheet
Reading down the list of the going wrongs
(Yeah yeah yeah)
I’m getting no sleep
Tossing and turning all night long
Oh there’s somewhere I’ve been meaning to
Take the conversation(All night long)
Oh yeah
There’s somewhere I’ve been meaning to
Take the conversation
But I just can’t do it
Just show me the back of it
Pretending I don’t know what it is
(Why don’t you miss me?)
I apologize me and my eyes
It’s simple and it goes like this
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
Yeah I’m in love with you
Oh yeah I got it
I found it
I just got to keep it
Don’t fuck it you muppet
It’s not that deep
I’ve been counting my blessings
Thinking this through
It’s like
One two
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
I’m in love with you I I I I I
